title: An answer to Dr. Stillingfleet's book of The unreasonableness of separation so far as it concerns The peaceable designe : with some animadversions upon the debate between him and Mr. Baxter concerning the national church and the head of it.
author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.
notes: Imprint date from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
